name: Ledger Light
description: Financial topology - blueprint mode, hopeful technical green, daytime analysis

character.short: Blueprint precision. Hopeful green on warm paper. The architect's working view.
character.extended: INSTRUMENT + GRADIENT: Daytime counterpart to Ledger Dark. Where Dark is vigilance, Light is planning. Where Dark finds pattern in noise, Light designs the structure. Technical drawing aesthetic with warmth.
character.mood: Constructive focus. Planning mode. The clarity of daylight analysis.

expression.INSTRUMENT: Blueprint as analytical tool. Clean measurement, clear structure.
expression.GRADIENT: Budget spectrums, goal progress, health indicators. Planning is gradient work.
expression.NAVIGATION: Financial roadmap. Where am I, where am I going.
expression.LIVING_GEOMETRY: Spending clusters breathing gently. Topology still lives, but calmer.

resonatesWith.translationNotes: Clean but not sterile. Warm paper, not pure white. Teal is hopeful, not clinical. The planner is optimistic.

particles.behavior: Breathing clusters with gentle orbital motion. Connected by faint lines.
particles.meaning: Spending categories as living clusters. Connections show relationships. Breathing rhythm is slower, more contemplative than Dark mode.

usage.IBM Plex Sans: Body text, descriptions. Lighter mode uses Sans for readability.

typography.note: Light mode shifts body to Sans for better daylight readability.

BudgetPlanner.meaning: Roadmap view. Where resources should flow.

GoalTracker.meaning: Progress as continuous spectrum. Never pass/fail binary.

ClusterView.meaning: Spending topology rendered in blueprint style.

layout.note: Navigation grid optional in light mode. Can feel too heavy.

motion.character: Gentle, contemplative. Slower breathing than Dark mode.

glitch.note: Minimal glitch in light mode. Clean, precise, planning-focused.
